body.name: COMBATH Light Bulb Security Camera, 5G/2.4GHz WiFi 2K Light Bulb Cameras Outdoor Indoor with E27 Socket, Motion Detection and Siren Alarm,Two-Way Talk,Color Night Vision,Compatible with Alexa
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 40 mins
FREE pickup Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 55 mins
features: 【5G/2.4GHz Dual Band】The latest 5G/2.4GHz dual-band light bulb camera have stronger signal reception, higher stability, longer distance to use, no lag and smoother real-time video compared to traditional 2.4G single-band lightbulb security camera. Simply screw camera light bulbs outdoor into the equipped E27 bulb base and plug it into a power outlet, download the Esceecloud APP and simply connect bulb camera 360 degree wifi outdoor to your home wifi. Equipped with a light socket adapter.

【Two-Way Talk & Real-Time Alerts】Cameras for home security outside built-in speaker support two-way language real-time call, communicate with your family members or visitors without any obstacles, realize face-to-face communication. You can set an audible alarm to sound a loud alarm when a moving object is detected，then built-in advanced microphone speaker allows you scare away uninvited guests, and say hello to welcome guests.

【360°Coverage & Motion Detection Alerts】Motion tracking supports 360 wireless bulb security camera to accurately detect objects and automatically track them in a super large range of Pan 355°and Tilt 90°vertically. After enabling, home security cameras will begin to automatically record and follow the object in motion, and "Alarm" when needed.

【2K HD & Color Night Vision Function】 Light bulb cameras with 2K Ultra resolution provides superior image quality that allows you to easily recognize faces and details. It has four floodlights and four IR lights which provide clear, colored images even in complete darkness. Security cameras can clearly monitor objects within 33 ft in low light environment. You can easily monitor your home or business during the day or night, and easily recognize any potential threats or intruders.

【Multi User Sharing & Smart Storage】Lightbulb camera 360 degree wifi outdoor supports multiple users to watch videos. You can share the device with your family and friends for simultaneous monitoring through the app. Camera bulb storage supports cloud storage (paid access required) and up to 128G micro SD card storage.Outdoor camera is Alexa compatible, easy to install and simple to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The picture quality is amazing both day and night
reviews.reviewText: This camera works very well! Very nice image and wide view. It's perfect for our RV. Easy to install and remove when traveling. I can turn on the camera when I'm out. I highly recommend this brand and camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Security Camera
reviews.reviewText: I bought this camera for indoor use mainly to monitor my pets while I'm away. I do not have light sockets in my house so I used the included power adapter, using this makes it easy to place this camera just about anywhere. Setting up the camera took about 5 minutes and is very easy to do with the mobile app. There are many different settings for motion detection and alerts. The picture is very clear and high definition. I used an SD card (not included) to record for a few seconds after motion is detected and have it send an alert to my phone. You can also schedule days/times do turn off motion detection. I plan on getting more of these for my house, they are a great value for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First off, Easy set up! Super cool concept vs trying to find a place to install or if you rent worrying about possible damages to rental properties for camera installation. Only issue is with our outdoor light socket makes the image upside down, but if you hold phone at right angle the image is flipped, maybe an option to dip the image would be a great improvement option for others with similar set ups! Otherwise 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy that I have purchased this product. It is very easy to setup and use. All you need to do is install the app to your phone and connect them together. Good price compared to other products!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect option for outdoor security camera. Connected to my Wifi easily, I can control the camera angle through the app very easily and get screenshots saved to my photos from the motion detection. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy security light
reviews.reviewText: Really liking my new security camera light . Has easy installation . Comes with instructions and you can control everything from the app on your phone . I feel better using this security camera light keeping an eye on my front yard . Great little buy that I’m glad I made

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Glitches but good
reviews.reviewText: Easy set up . impressive for price. I’m trying to “share device” with wife and the app produced QR code sends her to a bad link. Tried over a couple days- no luck. Also, theres “live chat support” but that doesn't work. So i emailed the company twice sharing the issues, no response yet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The video quality is good..
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I had an issue with the audio in the beginning. I contacted the seller and they promptly set out a replacement. It does to get noisy from time to time but doesn't constantly have bad sound.The camera is as clear as well and you can hang it upside down or right side up and it adjusts the image. Very easy to install. I love the 5g that you do not have to call your cable company and switch yourself over to 2.4 for the duration of the setup.
